work.title: find your tailored fit
work.contents: Get just what your home nedds width our unmatched selection of lengths, depths, and even seat heights.

work.title: make it yours
work.contents: Choose from doxens of styles, the industry's biggest selection of colors, and tons of available options.

work.title: get pro guidance
work.contents: We'll help you become a furniture expert and teach you what all the other companies don't want you to know.

work.title: built by us, in the U.S
work.contents: Your sofa is hand-built just for you in our dedicated factory in legendary furniture town Hickory, North Carolina.

work.title: our factory to you
work.contents: We'll deliver your custom furniture directly to your home or business, no matter where you live.

work.title: love it with confidence
work.contents: We know you'll love your new sofa, but you'll love it even more knowing it's covered by our exceptional warranty.
